pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Ion Selective Electrodes // Characterisation and calibration of single or multiple Ion Selective Electrodes (ISEs); activity estimation of experimental samples. Implements methods described in: Dillingham, P.W., Radu, T., Diamond, D., Radu, A. and McGraw, C.M. (2012) doi:10.1002/elan.201100510 and Dillingham, P.W., Alsaedi, B.S.O. and McGraw, C.M. (2017) doi:10.1109/ICSENS.2017.8233898.
